features.description: Allows businesses to manage multiple phone numbers for different locations or purposes, with separate numbers for automated messages and marketing campaigns
capabilities: Assign different phone numbers to different locations
Assign multiple locations to the same phone number
View phone number and location information in conversations
Separate marketing and transactional phone numbers
Staff access control based on location assignments

features.description: Comprehensive branding system allowing businesses to customize their visual identity across all customer touchpoints
capabilities: Upload custom business logo (.jpg or .png, minimum 80px height)
Set brand color with hex code support
Add cover image for client portal (minimum 600px width)
Apply branding to online booking, emails, client portal
Customize Front Desk Display welcome screen
user_benefits: Consistent brand experience across all platforms

features.description: Multi-location business management system supporting both physical and virtual locations with individual configuration options

Configure individual location details (address, contact, tax rates, timezone)
Assign services to specific locations with location-specific pricing
Assign staff members to specific locations
Share services, staff, and gift cards across locations
Generate separate reports per location
user_benefits: Separate business type management (salon vs spa)

features.description: System for adding, changing, and configuring different types of phone numbers for various business communication needs
capabilities: Add local phone numbers for two-way texting
Add toll-free numbers for marketing campaigns
Change existing phone numbers with immediate effect
Register toll-free numbers with business information
Assign phone numbers to specific locations
user_benefits: Area code alignment with business locations

features.description: Central management of core business information displayed across all customer-facing communications and documentation

Configure country and currency settings

features.description: Comprehensive system for setting up iPads as dedicated Front Desk Display terminals with restricted access and automatic functionality

Guided process for update installation
